alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Franklin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 26 at 4:13PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Catahoula and southern Franklin Parishes through 500 PM CDT... At 413 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Enterprise, or 18 miles southeast of Columbia, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Catahoula and southern Franklin Parishes, including the following locations... Sicily Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northeastern Louisiana.
